channel.title: The Lost Universe my first source
channel.description:
:)[left][size=10pt][shadow=red,left][b][sup]hi guys[/sup][/b][/shadow][/size], this is my first source please more advice on what to do to make even better ( im a rubbish coder i thought id give it a go =])[/left] DOWNLOAD LINKS AT THE BOTTOM!!!
so i decided to call it "The Lost Universe" and guys, i got someone to host this for me, they released this without my permission, when i find that person i shall speak to him about this.
The Reason im Officialy Releasing this is because i cant be asked to play RSPV's much more since ive got alot of studying to do, as my GSCE's are approching =O!!!
Features: Stability: can hold up 600+ players with no or little lagg like one lagg for 1 sec every 2/3 hours, TESTED. Very good economy: Okay training (not too fast, not to slow) good money making. 99.9% of specials working. 99.9% of glitchs fixed. Perfect PvP and NCvP. All levels required are all tested and okay. such as whip you cant wear that at 1 attack, you will need 70 attack to wield the whip. Lash (whip) DOESN'T train strength it trains Defence, Strength and Attack altogether. Working Dragon Scimitar Special; disables prayer for 20 seconds. Fully working Dragon Dagger Lots of customs such as Dragon Whip, Bandos Whip and ALOT more! Good Training area. Good Spacy home area not crowded its in barbarian village! Fully working minigames except Duel Arena (will be fixed in Next update) Comes with a pack of tools
[center]Pictures: Home: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2cdwj88.jpg[/img] Training: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/b8v34l.jpg[/img] Random Shop with random items (delete if you want) [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2zyzscm.jpg[/img] Picking Flax Works!!! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/qn331l.jpg[/img] Real Anim for Spinning Flax! (turns into BowString!!!) [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/347te08.jpg[/img] More Coming Soon!!![/center] Credits: ME: 70% creating and coding the source Guy: who made ZodiacsReign Package V8.0 The Awakening 15% Mark: helping me code 10% Friends and Encouragers: 5%
Download links: Client is 30.24MB :http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ZXA1P5WT Source is 5.05MB :http://www.megaupload.com/?d=1476J6IN
[u][b][center]Thanks guys and girls, and Please comment and give me Advice to becoming a Pro coder!!! =][/center][/b][/u][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2009, 06:23:18 pm[/size][hr]please reply and comment guys!!!

item.title: The Lost Universe my first source
item.dc:creator: @Jake_Bryan_Jones Jake Bryan Jones
item.description:
@Jake_Bryan_Jones wrote:

Lol, I’m sorry but if you called this The Lost Universe. Then you must of heard of the Real Owner of The Lost Universe.

This is not your source, this is not your Coding. Half ot the things in the Source are already in here… So yeah,

Good Leech

Read full topic

item.title: The Lost Universe my first source
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“IceTICKER, post:4, topic:317613”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=414123.msg3049146#msg3049146 date=1259979881]
I deserve more credits than you and I didn’t do nothing
[/quote]

Stop Complaining?[/quote]

Only if you suck my dick.

[quote=“noobspure50, post:5, topic:317613”][quote author=gunz4life link=topic=414123.msg3048982#msg3048982 date=1259973595]
Here, i’ll fix your credits.

98% delta
2% you, mark, and friends.

Your a dick

Most of those features are already in DeltaScape. And i doubt it’ll hold 600+ people, no vps/dedi and have no lag. Since you said you tested it, I’d advise you to make a video of 600+ people on, and you walking around with no lag?

Edited:

Also why did you call the guy who made thread “Zombie-Scape with guns!” a leecher, if this is a leech as well? just curious.
[/quote][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=414123.msg3049146#msg3049146 date=1259979881]
I deserve more credits than you and I didn’t do nothing
[/quote]
and your an ass
Grey job it looks good good work on this hun[/quote]

I’m an ass? You can’t even make the simplest program without using google.com

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kambo77 kambo77
item.description:
@kambo77 wrote:

:)[left][size=10pt][shadow=red,left][sup]hi guys[/sup][/shadow][/size], this is my first source please more advice on what to do to make even better ( im a rubbish coder i thought id give it a go =])[/left]
DOWNLOAD LINKS AT THE BOTTOM!!!

so i decided to call it “The Lost Universe” and guys, i got someone to host this for me, they released this without my permission, when i find that person i shall speak to him about this.

The Reason im Officialy Releasing this is because i cant be asked to play RSPV’s much more since ive got alot of studying to do, as my GSCE’s are approching =O!!!

Features:
Stability: can hold up 600+ players with no or little lagg like one lagg for 1 sec every 2/3 hours, TESTED.
Very good economy: Okay training (not too fast, not to slow) good money making.
99.9% of specials working.
99.9% of glitchs fixed.
Perfect PvP and NCvP.
All levels required are all tested and okay. such as whip you cant wear that at 1 attack, you will need 70 attack to wield the whip.
Lash (whip) DOESN’T train strength it trains Defence, Strength and Attack altogether.
Working Dragon Scimitar Special; disables prayer for 20 seconds.
Fully working Dragon Dagger
Lots of customs such as Dragon Whip, Bandos Whip and ALOT more!
Good Training area.
Good Spacy home area not crowded its in barbarian village!
Fully working minigames except Duel Arena (will be fixed in Next update)
Comes with a pack of tools

[center]Pictures:

Training:

Random Shop with random items (delete if you want)

Picking Flax Works!!!

Real Anim for Spinning Flax! (turns into BowString!!!)

More Coming Soon!!![/center]
